page.title: 20BURTON PIDSEA SCHOOLCHILDREN
page.content: The Domesday Project The Project was undertaken by the children of Class J1, Burton Pidsea School, with extra help from some of the older children in the school, and parents They spent weeks making a study of their local area and they thoroughly enjoyed the experience. Work included in this programme was prepared by:- Terri Bielby Paul Blakeston Kelly Angus Michael Bromby Nicola Gibson Ruth Brooke Emma Haldenby Helen Dixon Fiona Lakeman Kelly Hardmeat Shaneen Laws Laura Heath Terry Sanderson Sharon King Hayley Walker Claire Lowson Where necessary work was edited by the class teacher, Mrs.K.L.Brown.
